mapper.sql:
select codigo_usuario as codigo, nom_usuario as nombre, ape_paterno as apellidoPaterno, ape_materno as apellidoMaterno, num_dni as dni, est_usuario as estado, des_email as email, tel_movil as telefonoMovil, tel_fijo as telefonoFijo, c_cargo as cargo, c_sexo as sexo, n_nivel as nivel, N_ID_OD as codigoOD, c_iddepartamento as idDepartamento from sid_seg_usuario where 1=1
and upper(codigo_usuario)=upper(#{codigo})
and num_dni=#{dni}
and UPPER(nom_usuario) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{nombre})||'%'
and UPPER(ape_paterno) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{apellidoPaterno})||'%'
and UPPER(ape_materno) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{apellidoMaterno})||'%'
order by codigo
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT codigo_usuario as codigo, nom_usuario as nombre, ape_paterno as apellidoPaterno, ape_materno as apellidoMaterno, num_dni as dni, est_usuario as estado, des_email as email, tel_movil as telefonoMovil, tel_fijo as telefonoFijo, c_cargo as cargo, c_ruta as ruta, c_iddepartamento as idDepartamento, c_sexo as sexo, n_id_od as codigoOD FROM ( SELECT codigo_usuario, nom_usuario, ape_paterno, ape_materno, num_dni, est_usuario, des_email, tel_movil, tel_fijo, c_cargo, c_ruta, c_iddepartamento, c_sexo, n_id_od, ROWNUM numfila FROM ( select codigo_usuario, nom_usuario, ape_paterno, ape_materno, num_dni, est_usuario, des_email, tel_movil, tel_fijo, c_cargo, c_ruta, C_IDDEPARTAMENTO, c_sexo, n_id_od from sid_seg_usuario where 1=1 order by codigo_usuario ) B ) A WHERE 1=1
and upper(codigo_usuario)=upper(#{codigo})
and num_dni LIKE '%'||#{dni}||'%'
and UPPER(nom_usuario) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{nombre})||'%'
and UPPER(ape_paterno) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{apellidoPaterno})||'%'
and UPPER(ape_materno) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{apellidoMaterno})||'%'
select count(*) from sid_seg_usuario u, sid_vw_usuario t where u.codigo_usuario = t.usuario_usu and upper(u.codigo_usuario)=upper(#{codigo}) and t.tpircne =#{clave}
